words.example: The aberrant behavior of the student worried the teacher.
words.chineseOfExample: 这个学生的异常行为让老师很担心。

words.example: His business acumen made him a successful entrepreneur.
words.chineseOfExample: 他的商业敏锐度使他成为了一名成功的企业家。

words.example: She accepted the invitation with alacrity.
words.chineseOfExample: 她欣然接受了邀请。

words.chineseMeaning: 模棱两可的，含糊不清的
words.example: The ambiguous statement caused confusion among the listeners.
words.chineseOfExample: 这个含糊不清的声明在听众中引起了困惑。

words.example: The sudden drop in temperature was an anomaly for this time of year.
words.chineseOfExample: 气温的突然下降在一年的这个时候是反常现象。

phrases.example: His actions are at odds with his words.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他的行动与他的言语不一致。

phrases.example: The technology is advancing by leaps and bounds.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 这项技术正在突飞猛进地发展。

phrases.example: He gave me a gift card in lieu of a present.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他给了我一张礼品卡代替礼物。

phrases.example: The company is on the verge of bankruptcy.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 这家公司濒临破产。

phrases.example: She followed the instructions to the letter.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 她严格按照指示行事。

words.example: She has an affinity for languages.
words.chineseOfExample: 她对语言有天赋。

words.example: The new medicine alleviated his pain.
words.chineseOfExample: 新药减轻了他的痛苦。

words.example: They took steps to ameliorate the living conditions.
words.chineseOfExample: 他们采取措施改善生活条件。

words.example: He told us some amusing anecdotes about his childhood.
words.chineseOfExample: 他给我们讲了一些他童年的趣事。

words.example: His remarks antagonized many people.
words.chineseOfExample: 他的言论激怒了很多人。

words.example: The monks lived an austere life.
words.chineseOfExample: 僧侣们过着简朴的生活。

words.example: His speech was full of banal clichés.
words.chineseOfExample: 他的演讲充满了陈词滥调。

words.example: The belligerent country refused to negotiate.
words.chineseOfExample: 这个好战的国家拒绝谈判。

words.example: She managed to cajole him into helping her.
words.chineseOfExample: 她成功哄骗他来帮自己。

words.example: The weather here is capricious.
words.chineseOfExample: 这里的天气变幻无常。

phrases.example: The two parties are at loggerheads over the budget.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 两党在预算问题上争执不下。

phrases.example: Only a few people were privy to the details of the plan.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 只有少数人知道计划的细节。

phrases.example: He decided to bide his time before making a move.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他决定等待时机再行动。

phrases.example: In this company, he calls the shots.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 在这家公司里，他说了算。

phrases.example: Don't cast aspersions on his character.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 别诋毁他的人格。

words.chineseMeaning: 催化剂；促使变化的人或事物
words.example: The invention of the Internet was a catalyst for many social changes.
words.chineseOfExample: 互联网的发明是许多社会变革的催化剂。

words.example: The teacher chastised the student for being late.
words.chineseOfExample: 老师因学生迟到而斥责了他。

words.example: Investors should be circumspect in volatile markets.
words.chineseOfExample: 投资者在动荡的市场中应保持谨慎。

words.chineseMeaning: 有说服力的，令人信服的
words.example: He presented a cogent argument for the proposal.
words.chineseOfExample: 他为该提案提出了有说服力的论据。

words.example: A quiet environment is conducive to study.
words.chineseOfExample: 安静的环境有助于学习。

words.example: The two countries are contiguous.
words.chineseOfExample: 这两个国家相邻。

words.example: He seemed genuinely contrite for his mistake.
words.chineseOfExample: 他似乎真的为自己的错误感到懊悔。

words.example: He gave the report only a cursory glance.
words.chineseOfExample: 他只是粗略地看了一眼报告。

words.example: The company's new product launch was a debacle.
words.chineseOfExample: 公司新产品的推出一败涂地。

words.example: She always behaves with great decorum.
words.chineseOfExample: 她举止总是十分端庄。

phrases.example: We need to come to grips with the reality of the situation.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 我们需要认真面对现实情况。

phrases.example: You shouldn't cut corners when building a house.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 盖房子时不应偷工减料。

phrases.example: They decided to do away with the old system.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他们决定废除旧制度。

phrases.example: His performance fell short of our expectations.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他的表现未达到我们的期望。

phrases.example: His anger got the better of him.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他没能控制住自己的怒火。

words.example: The defunct company left many employees unemployed.
words.chineseOfExample: 这家倒闭的公司让许多员工失业。

words.example: Smoking is deleterious to your health.
words.chineseOfExample: 吸烟有害健康。

words.chineseMeaning: 煽动者，蛊惑民心的政客
words.example: The demagogue stirred up the crowd with his false promises.
words.chineseOfExample: 这个煽动者用虚假承诺煽动群众。

words.example: The sun desiccated the soil.
words.chineseOfExample: 太阳使土壤变得干燥。

words.example: She was too diffident to speak in public.
words.chineseOfExample: 她太羞怯，不敢在公众场合讲话。

words.example: He is a diligent student who always studies hard.
words.chineseOfExample: 他是个勤奋的学生，总是努力学习。

words.example: She was very discreet about her personal life.
words.chineseOfExample: 她对自己的私生活很谨慎。

words.example: Don't disparage his efforts.
words.chineseOfExample: 别贬低他的努力。

words.example: The organization disseminates information about environmental protection.
words.chineseOfExample: 该组织传播环保信息。

words.chineseMeaning: 休眠的，蛰伏的；暂停活动的
words.example: The volcano has been dormant for years.
words.chineseOfExample: 这座火山已经休眠多年。

phrases.example: The new policy gave rise to a lot of controversy.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 新政策引发了很多争议。

phrases.example: He always goes the extra mile to help his customers.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他总是加倍努力帮助客户。

phrases.example: Our company has an edge over competitors in terms of technology.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 我们公司在技术方面比竞争对手有优势。

phrases.example: In the long run, exercise is beneficial for your health.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 从长远来看，锻炼有益于健康。

phrases.example: The parents keep tabs on their children's activities.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 父母密切关注孩子的活动。

words.chineseMeaning: 热情奔放的，兴高采烈的
words.example: The ebullient crowd cheered for their team.
words.chineseOfExample: 热情的人群为他们的队伍欢呼。

words.example: Her taste in music is eclectic.
words.chineseOfExample: 她的音乐品味很广泛。

words.chineseMeaning: 抹去，消除；使自己不受注意
words.example: Time can efface the memory of past events.
words.chineseOfExample: 时间能抹去对过去事件的记忆。

words.example: His behavior at the party was egregious.
words.chineseOfExample: 他在聚会上的行为极其恶劣。

words.example: The teacher's question elicited a lot of responses from the students.
words.chineseOfExample: 老师的问题引发了学生们很多回应。

words.chineseMeaning: 难以捉摸的，不易找到的
words.example: The solution to the problem remains elusive.
words.chineseOfExample: 这个问题的解决方案仍然难以找到。

words.example: Education can emancipate people from ignorance.
words.chineseOfExample: 教育能使人们摆脱愚昧。

words.chineseMeaning: 基于观察或实验的，经验主义的
words.example: Scientists rely on empirical evidence to support their theories.
words.chineseOfExample: 科学家依靠实证来支持他们的理论。

words.example: The long illness enervated him.
words.chineseOfExample: 长期的疾病使他虚弱。

words.example: She is an enigma to me.
words.chineseOfExample: 她对我来说是个谜。

phrases.phrase: lay one's cards on the table
phrases.chineseMeaning: 摊牌，把自己的想法和盘托出
phrases.example: It's time to lay our cards on the table and discuss the issue openly.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 是时候摊牌，公开讨论这个问题了。

phrases.example: Don't make a fuss about a small mistake.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 别为一个小错误大惊小怪。

phrases.example: You need to be on the ball if you want to succeed in this business.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 如果你想在这一行取得成功，就得机灵点。

phrases.phrase: put the cart before the horse
phrases.example: You're putting the cart before the horse by starting to build the house without a plan.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 你没计划就开始盖房子，这是本末倒置。

phrases.phrase: take a leaf out of someone's book
phrases.chineseMeaning: 学习某人的长处，效仿某人
phrases.example: We should take a leaf out of his book and work harder.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 我们应该学习他的榜样，更加努力工作。

words.example: The beauty of the cherry blossoms is ephemeral.
words.chineseOfExample: 樱花之美转瞬即逝。

words.example: She faced the difficult situation with equanimity.
words.chineseOfExample: 她镇定自若地面对困境。

words.example: The erudite professor gave an excellent lecture.
words.chineseOfExample: 这位博学的教授讲了一堂精彩的课。

words.chineseMeaning: 深奥的，只有内行才懂的
words.example: This is an esoteric subject that few people understand.
words.chineseOfExample: 这是一个很少有人懂的深奥学科。

words.example: Her smile was evanescent.
words.chineseOfExample: 她的笑容一闪即逝。

words.example: The lack of rain exacerbated the drought situation.
words.chineseOfExample: 降雨不足加剧了干旱状况。

words.example: The new evidence exculpated him from the crime.
words.chineseOfExample: 新证据证明他无罪。

words.example: The investigation exonerated her of all charges.
words.chineseOfExample: 调查结果证明她所有指控都不成立。

words.example: The price of the house is exorbitant.
words.chineseOfExample: 这房子的价格高得离谱。

words.example: They extolled the virtues of the new system.
words.chineseOfExample: 他们赞扬了新系统的优点。

phrases.example: We can't turn a blind eye to the environmental problems.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 我们不能对环境问题视而不见。

phrases.example: He turned a deaf ear to our warnings.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他对我们的警告充耳不闻。

phrases.phrase: wear one's heart on one's sleeve
phrases.chineseMeaning: 坦率地表达自己的感情
phrases.example: She wears her heart on her sleeve and is never afraid to show her emotions.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 她总是坦率地表达自己的感情，从不害怕表露情绪。

phrases.example: She passed the exam with flying colors.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 她以优异的成绩通过了考试。

phrases.example: The police worked hand in glove with the community to solve the crime.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 警方与社区密切合作侦破了这起案件。

words.example: His argument is fallacious.
words.chineseOfExample: 他的论点是错误的。

words.example: His fatuous remarks made everyone laugh.
words.chineseOfExample: 他愚蠢的言论让大家都笑了。

words.example: He is a fervent supporter of the environmental movement.
words.chineseOfExample: 他是环保运动的热情支持者。

words.example: The fickle weather here can change in an instant.
words.chineseOfExample: 这里多变的天气瞬间就能变。

words.example: He has a flamboyant style of dressing.
words.chineseOfExample: 他的穿着风格很浮夸。

words.example: Our meeting was fortuitous.
words.chineseOfExample: 我们的相遇纯属偶然。

words.example: Don't waste your time on frivolous things.
words.chineseOfExample: 别把时间浪费在无聊的事情上。

words.example: The senator fulminated against the new tax policy.
words.chineseOfExample: 参议员强烈谴责新的税收政策。

words.example: The garrulous old man talked non - stop.
words.chineseOfExample: 这位喋喋不休的老人说个不停。

words.example: She is a gregarious person who loves parties.
words.chineseOfExample: 她是个爱交际的人，喜欢参加派对。

phrases.example: He decided to bite the bullet and tell her the truth.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他决定勇敢面对，把真相告诉她。

phrases.example: His joke helped to break the ice at the party.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他的笑话帮助打破了聚会上的僵局。

phrases.example: It's getting late. Let's call it a day.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 天色已晚，咱们收工吧。

phrases.example: He didn't cut the mustard in his new job.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他在新工作中没能达到要求。

phrases.phrase: hit the nail on the head
phrases.example: She hit the nail on the head when she described the problem.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 她描述问题时一针见血。

words.example: His speech was full of hackneyed phrases.
words.chineseOfExample: 他的演讲满是陈词滥调。

words.chineseMeaning: 平静的，愉快的；美好的往昔
words.example: They remember the halcyon days of their childhood.
words.chineseOfExample: 他们回忆起童年的美好时光。

words.chineseMeaning: 长篇大论地训斥，滔滔不绝地演讲
words.example: The boss harangued the employees about their poor performance.
words.chineseOfExample: 老板就员工糟糕的表现长篇大论地训斥了一番。

words.example: His lifestyle seems to be based on hedonism.
words.chineseOfExample: 他的生活方式似乎基于享乐主义。

words.example: His ideas were considered heretical by the traditionalists.
words.chineseOfExample: 他的想法被传统主义者视为异端。

words.example: Her histrionic behavior at the party was embarrassing.
words.chineseOfExample: 她在聚会上夸张的表现很让人尴尬。

words.chineseMeaning: 同种类的，同性质的，均匀的
words.example: The population in this area is relatively homogeneous.
words.chineseOfExample: 这个地区的人口相对同质。

words.example: His hubris led to his downfall.
words.chineseOfExample: 他的狂妄自大导致了他的失败。

words.chineseMeaning: 攻击传统观念的人，打破旧习的人
words.example: The artist is an iconoclast who challenges the traditional art forms.
words.chineseOfExample: 这位艺术家是个挑战传统艺术形式的革新者。

words.example: Everyone has their own idiosyncrasies.
words.chineseOfExample: 每个人都有自己的怪癖。

phrases.example: Many companies jumped on the bandwagon of the new technology.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 许多公司纷纷跟风采用这项新技术。

phrases.example: She keeps him at arm's length because she doesn't trust him.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 她与他保持距离，因为不信任他。

phrases.phrase: let the cat out of the bag
phrases.example: He accidentally let the cat out of the bag about the surprise party.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他不小心泄露了惊喜派对的秘密。

phrases.chineseMeaning: 收支平衡，勉强维持生计
phrases.example: With the high cost of living, it's hard for many families to make ends meet.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 生活成本高，许多家庭难以维持生计。

phrases.phrase: put one's foot in one's mouth
phrases.example: He really put his foot in his mouth when he made that comment.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他发表那番评论时真的是说错话了。
